amendment.description: Amendment prohibits funding to propose or finalize a regulatory action until January 21, 2017.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 33 printed in House Report 114-639 to prohibit funding to propose or finalize a regulatory action until January 21, 2017.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hudson amendment (A027) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Hudson amendment (A027) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A027) offered by Mr. Hudson.
